Package net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.strong.oath.totp

Interface Summary
TotpOathDetailsSource A strategy API to define operations pertaining to TOTP authentication information retrieval such as TOTP attributes for principals.
 

Class Summary
TOTP TOTP implementation is copied from @{link https://github.com/parkghost/TOTP-authentication-demo}
TotpAuthenticationHandler AuthenticationHandler to authenticate provided credentials in a form of time-based one-tme passwords (TOTP) Re-uses standard CAS' UsernamePasswordCredentials and assumes that one time password tokens are appropriately un-marshaled into UsernamePasswordCredentials.password field by layers above it.
TOTPUtils Copied from @{link https://github.com/parkghost/TOTP-authentication-demo} NOTE: in order to use this class in CAS maven war overlays, exclude the following jar in the maven-war-plugin->configuration->overlays->excludes section of local maven overlay pom.xml: WEB-INF/lib/commons-codec-1.4.jar
 

Enum Summary
TotpOathDetailsSource.OTP Map keys for otp attributes
